reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, particularly appreciating the print options, and find it well-made with sturdy material that's softer than expected. The dress is comfortable, with one customer noting the bodice is lined for added comfort, and features convenient pockets. While some customers find it true to size, others mention it runs bigger than expected. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many compliments
items.body: I get so many compliments on this darn dress it‚Äôs not even funny. Super cute and comfy and fits really well. It‚Äôs very flattering and slips on and off without me having to button it. Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and cute
items.body: Super cute! Love the pockets. Got compliments all day! Read more
items.author: Brooke Dobson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars FINALLY! 3X DRESS that FITS & FLATTERS!
items.body: Being a big girl with a big bosom means I usually have to go separate on top & bottom as dresses don‚Äôt usually fit all the curves & bumps right OR are smaller than size promised. This is A WINNER! I got the colorful dot dress for ‚Äúclown day‚Äù at work & got so many compliments all day long!(I‚Äôll wear it for other things too.) I would love to invest in More of these in different colors! It‚Äôs mostly cotton (natural, breathable) with just enough spandex to stretch! (Fits curves & I didn‚Äôt have to unzip actually to get in it.) The bodice is lined for comfort & smoothness. THIS FIT FLATTERS - the wide neck, cap sleeves with fitted bodice & flare skirt past the knee is modest & attractive. If you used to be a Coke bottle shape but gained a lot all over-you will probably love it as well. I am 5‚Äô5 & fall within the weight listed on their size chart under 3X. I found it fit truer to size in the most flattering way than just about any dress I‚Äôve ever wore & I‚Äôve worn many! Read more
items.author: BJ Azle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely but needs quality control.
items.body: Love the dress and the way that it looks on me, but for $30, I'd expect a better quality fabric and construction. The fabric feels like a cheap cotton and is only lined at the bust. Read more
items.author: Mina Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has REAL pockets!
items.body: Fits beautifully! The material is thick without being bulky or hot. The zipper is a bit stiff but could just be from being new. Very easy to wash. Only thing, the shoulders are a bit snug but it doesn't seem to be a big issue thus far. Read more
items.author: Kathryne Gampel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Adorable but the red dye bleeds!
items.body: This dress is absolutely adorable on! True to size. However, I wore it trick or treating with my granddaughter in the rain and the red bled into the white dots. I‚Äôm highly disappointed because I love how it looks on me. I‚Äôm going to see if I can return it. Read more
items.author: Carol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loves it.
items.body: Bought this for my 13 year old granddaughter. She loves dresses and always asks for me to get her dresses for her birthday. It is well made. Not stretchy, but fits her very well. Is a good length and nice shape. Will definitely purchase more. Good value. She loves it. Read more
items.author: Kelly Griswold

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Complaints!
items.body: I had bought a tulle petti coat to wear under it (black) from another commpany. It's a MUST! The fit was fabuluos, I wwas so worried! I bought small, and I am 5'3" and 125lbs (with my butt and thighs carrying the weight!) Bust is 34B Thee cap sleeves were better than another company I ahd bought, and I could move freely. The dress fit like a glove and looked amazing! I happened to have bought a christmas apron which I used for carrying my new puppy in the truck while traveling. I got so many compliments I kept it on, lol. Material is a medium cotton and still tended to want to wrinkle after ironing. ALSO be aware that it will TURN DARKER when ironing (you'll think you burned it). This fades in time so just be aware! Read more
items.author: suzanne swift

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: P-red Plaid, Z-white Red Flower, Z-green Print, Z-porcelain, Z-black Flower, Z-white Sunflower, Z-colorful Glass, Black, Z-pumpkin, Orange, Z-green Leaves, Blush Pink, Z-daisy, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
